ExampleDefinition.Title: Using ThemeManager
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates easy Xaml Styling via the ThemeManager. SciChart includes six pre-defined Themes, which provide chart pane, grid-line brushes and default colors for Renderable Series
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Using ThemeManager</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">SciChart Ships with 7 stunning themes, which you can apply to your charts with a single line of code. This example showcases the themes, and how they affect default cursor, zoom, axis, grid and series colors. </Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Change the drop-down to update the theme.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - If you need a custom theme, just drop us a request in our Forums, we'd be happy to oblige!</Run>
